title: Disney's Jonas Brothers - Nintendo DS
features: Live out the rock star life of the JONAS band members and find out how everyday life collides with the pop star world in the new JONAS video game for Nintendo DS.  Inspired by the latest hit Disney Channel Original Series, JONAS allows fans to play as the Jonas brothers and band members,  Nick, Joe and Kevin in a non-stop, hilarious adventure.
description: Product description

Live out the rock star life of the JONAS band members and find out how everyday life collides with the pop star world in the new JONAS video game for Nintendo DS.  Inspired by the latest hit Disney Channel Original Series,
JONAS

allows fans to play as the Jonas brothers and band members,  Nick, Joe and Kevin in a non-stop, hilarious adventure. Play as any one of the Jonas brothers and help them tear up the stage, juggle school and friends and still make it home in time for dinner.  Fans can go on outrageous adventures with friends Stella and Macy, set in favorite TV show locations featuring catchy JONAS music.

Amazon.com

It's not easy being a rock star. Not only do you have to rock out and keep your fans under control, but you also have to juggle school and friends. And you still have to make it home in time for dinner. Players must stay on their toes and steer clear of JONAS-mania in this musical adventure with their favorite superstar idols.
Play as your favorite Jonas
View larger

View larger.
Synopsis

Live out the rock star life of the JONAS band members and find out how everyday life collides with the pop star world in the new JONAS video game for Nintendo DS. Inspired by the hit Disney Channel series, JONAS takes you inside the hilarious world of the JONAS brothers. Play as Nick, Joe or Kevin or as their alter egos, the Lucas brothers, and go on outrageous adventures with friends Stella and Macy. Featuring locations from the TV show and cool JONAS music, this is one game that definitely strikes the right chord.
Key Game Features
Play as your favorite JONAS brother or as their alter egos, the Lucas brothers
Play as your favorite JONAS brother or as their alter egos, the Lucas brothers
Overcome obstacles and keep fan hysteria under control by hitting the right notes
Overcome obstacles and keep fan hysteria under control by hitting the right notes
